pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatially Balanced Samples of Spatial Objects // Routines for drawing samples from spatial objects, focused on spatially balanced algorithms. Draws Halton Iterative Partition (HIP) (Robertson et al., 2018; doi:10.1007/s10651-018-0406-6), Balanced Acceptance Samples (BAS) (Robertson et al., 2013; doi:10.1111/biom.12059), Generalized Random Tessellation Stratified (GRTS) (Stevens and Olsen, 2004; doi:10.1198/016214504000000250), Simple Systematic Samples (SSS) and Simple Random Samples (SRS) from point, line, and polygon resources. Frames are 'SpatialPoints', 'SpatialLines', or 'SpatialPolygons' objects from package 'sp'.
